Bash(git commit -m "fix(ux): Wait for actual Lightning UI elements instead of just URL

The script was closing too early because Salesforce redirects to .my.salesforce.com
URL before 2FA completes. Now waits for actual App Launcher button to appear,
which only loads after full authentication.

Changes:
- Wait for URL change to SF domain
- Then wait for App Launcher button selector
- Shows ''Still waiting...'' message during 2FA step
- Only closes browser after Lightning UI fully loads

This ensures browser stays open through entire 2FA flow.")

Bash(git commit -m "fix(cli): Load Salesforce session file correctly

Removed broken import of deleted sf_session_manager module.
Now simply loads hitl/salesforce_auth.json if it exists.

Session validity is checked by wrapper scripts before Docker launch,
so CLI just needs to load the file.")

Bash(git commit -m "chore: Remove debug output from pacts.bat wrapper

Removed ''[DEBUG] Salesforce test detected'' message.
Session check now runs silently unless session needs refresh.")
